description: This region is located on the eastern coast of the Mediterranean Sea and includes areas such as Galilee, Samaria, and Judea.  It also includes a portion of the Sinai Peninsula.
title: Israel

description: This area is primarily located in the northern portion of the region depicted in the map. It encompasses regions such as Lebanon, Syria, and a small part of Jordan.
title: Northern Levant

description: This region is situated in the southern portion of the area shown on the map, and it consists mainly of the Sinai Peninsula and parts of the Arabian Desert.
title: Southern Levant and Sinai
